org.bytedeco.javacv

Class FrameFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacv.FrameFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FFmpegFrameFilter

    public abstract class FrameFilter
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A frame processor that may filter video and audio frames, or both. After calling start(), we can add frames to the graph with push(Frame) and get the filtered ones with pull().
    Author:
    Samuel Audet
